description: Number of n X n (real) {0,1}-matrices having determinant A003432(n).
references: Miodrag Zivkovic, Classification of small (0,1) matrices, Linear Algebra and its Applications, 414 (2006), 310-346
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hadamard's Maximum Determinant Problem.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: a(5) = 3600 from Daniel P. Corson (danl(AT)MIT.EDU), Jan 09 2000
a(6) = 529200, a(7) = 75600 from Ulrich Hermisson (uhermiss(AT)rz.uni-leipzig.de), Feb 25, 2003
More terms from Miodrag Zivkovic (ezivkovm(AT)matf.bg.ac.yu), Feb 28 2006
